channel.title: About the Blog discussions category
channel.description:
This category is dedicated to discussions revolving around the [MESG Blog](https://blog.mesg.com).
Feel free to leave any questions, comments, suggestions or feedback on blog content and topics in this category.
Ensure each new post contains a URL referencing the original content on the blog.
